statements: SELECT * FROM project_milestones WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT milestone_id, milestone_description FROM project_milestones WHERE team_member_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM project_milestones WHERE deadline > '2022-06-30';
SELECT milestone_id, progress_update, team_member_id FROM project_milestones WHERE project_id = 2 AND team_member_id = 4;
SELECT project_id, milestone_description, deadline FROM project_milestones ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT project_id, milestone_description, deadline FROM project_milestones WHERE team_member_id = 1 ORDER BY deadline DESC
SELECT milestone_description, progress_update FROM project_milestones WHERE project_id = 3
SELECT milestone_id, progress_update, team_member_id FROM project_milestones WHERE deadline > '2022-01-15'
SELECT * FROM project_milestones WHERE project_id = 5 AND team_member_id IN (2, 3)
SELECT DISTINCT team_member_id FROM project_milestones
SELECT * FROM project_milestones;
SELECT milestone_id, milestone_name FROM project_milestones WHERE team_member_id = 1;
SELECT milestone_id, milestone_name, deadline FROM project_milestones WHERE deadline > '2022-12-31';
SELECT milestone_id, milestone_name FROM project_milestones ORDER BY milestone_name DESC;
SELECT p.milestone_name, pu.update_description, pu.update_date FROM project_milestones p JOIN progress_updates pu ON p.milestone_id = pu.milestone_id;
SELECT milestone_name, team_member_id FROM project_milestones WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT milestone_name, deadline FROM project_milestones ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT milestone_name, update_description, update_date FROM project_milestones JOIN progress_updates ON project_milestones.milestone_id = progress_updates.milestone_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_milestones FROM project_milestones;
SELECT milestone_name, deadline FROM project_milestones WHERE team_member_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM project_milestones WHERE milestone_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT project_id, milestone_name FROM project_milestones ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT update_id, update_date, update_description FROM progress_updates WHERE project_id = 12345;
SELECT team_member_id, performance_rating FROM team_performance WHERE deadline_met = TRUE ORDER BY performance_rating DESC;
SELECT project_id, milestone_name, milestone_date FROM project_milestones WHERE milestone_name LIKE '%launch%';
SELECT * FROM project_milestones WHERE project_id = 1 ORDER BY milestone_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, milestone_name FROM project_milestones WHERE milestone_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT t.project_id, t.team_member_id, p.performance_rating FROM team_performance t JOIN project_milestones p ON t.project_id = p.project_id WHERE p.milestone_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY p.milestone_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT project_id FROM progress_updates WHERE update_description LIKE '%completed%';
SELECT p.project_id, p.milestone_name, u.update_date FROM project_milestones p LEFT JOIN progress_updates u ON p.project_id = u.project_id WHERE u.update_date IS NULL ORDER BY p.project_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM projects
SELECT project_name, deadline FROM projects WHERE project_id = 1
SELECT milestone_name FROM milestones WHERE completed = TRUE
SELECT project_name, deadline FROM projects ORDER BY deadline DESC
SELECT member_name, member_email FROM team_members
SELECT project_id, project_name, deadline FROM projects WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT milestone_name, milestone_date, completed FROM milestones WHERE completed = TRUE ORDER BY milestone_date DESC;
SELECT member_name, member_email FROM team_members WHERE member_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY member_name;

SELECT project_name, milestone_name, update_date, update_description FROM projects p JOIN progress_updates pu ON p.project_id = pu.project_id JOIN milestones m ON pu.milestone_id = m.milestone_id WHERE m.completed = FALSE ORDER BY update_date ASC;
SELECT project_name, COUNT(*) AS total_milestones FROM projects p JOIN milestones m ON p.project_id = m.project_id GROUP BY project_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY total_milestones DESC;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM projects WHERE due_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT milestone_name, milestone_description FROM milestones ORDER BY milestone_date DESC;
SELECT member_name, role FROM team_members WHERE role = 'Developer';
SELECT team_name, project_id FROM teams JOIN projects ON teams.project_id = projects.project_id;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM milestones WHERE milestone_date < '2022-07-01' ORDER BY milestone_date DESC;
SELECT team_name, team_id FROM teams WHERE project_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND team_name LIKE '%Engineering%';
SELECT member_name, role FROM team_members ORDER BY role ASC, member_name DESC;
SELECT milestone_name, milestone_date FROM milestones JOIN projects ON milestones.project_id = projects.project_id WHERE project_name = 'Project X' ORDER BY milestone_date ASC;
